qa_pairs.question: What programs does MCT offer?
qa_pairs.answer: We offer B.Sc. in Multimedia and Creative Technology and Diploma in Digital Content Creation.

qa_pairs.question: What are the admission requirements?
qa_pairs.answer: Undergraduate: Minimum GPA 2.5 in SSC+HSC. Diploma: 4-year relevant diploma with GPA 2.5.

facts.info: State-of-the-art labs: AR Lab, Motion Capture Studio, 3D Animation Lab
Email: mct@diu.edu.bd | Phone: +880 1234-567890 | Location: Knowledge Tower
Developer of this app is Md. Sultan Mahmud Munna
